directions: Process bananas, peanut butter, vanilla extract, and ground cinnamon together in a food processor, pausing to scrape down the sides occasionally, until smooth. Add soy milk and blend until smooth. Scoop into bowls and top with chopped almonds.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped almonds, or to taste
title: Mrs. McG's Vegan Peanut Butter Banana Ice Cream
